summary: Feature request to add support for attaching priority annotations to workflows and activities in the TypeScript SDK. Details referenced in the cross-SDK features issue #593.
userImpact: Users cannot currently specify priority levels for workflows and activities, limiting control over execution scheduling and resource allocation.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and issue closed; priority annotation support is now available in TypeScript SDK.
keyQuote: Add support for attaching priority to workflows/activities
